page.title: 13RUDDINGTON PANTOMIME
page.content: Every year a {Pantomime }is performed in February on the stage in the Junior School for 4 nights. It all started when{Lorna McCullough } was asked to do monologues at the Harvest supper.The next year she was asked again and on the third year she thought every-one would be getting fed up so she got a group together to do a sketch. They did a little humorous play based on the Archers from the radio.Mr.Jack suggested that they ought to continue the group and entertain the village every year. The first pantomime was {Robin Hood } in 1981 and since then {Lorna {McCullogh}has written one every year and they have got more spectacular and a great success.This years was { {Twinkle Twinkle Little Star.}They give the profits to local charities and good causes.
